dict.string:
This patch returns a member or members in a structure resulting from a path search.
For example, if you had an indexed structure with two members, a structure with key "name", value "Cat", and a structure with key "name", value "Dog", you could use a path of "0.name" to get the value "Cat". If you used a key of "*.name", you'd get a structure with "Cat" and "Dog".
Origami http://origami.facebook.com/
